name: Arena Crawl
description:
My first little game created in Godot. I mainly created it to get into the engine. Therefore it will probably never be more than what it is right now. Please leave feedback if You like, it is always appreciated :3

Instructions:

W, A, S, D; Arrows or swipe to move, the rest should be fairly obvious once you try it out ;)

The art is taken from one of the amazing assets provided by Kenney. Thank You so much for all Your work :)
